New Records: Georgia's win over Portugal is the biggest upset by FIFA rankings in European Championship history
Georges Mikautadze is the top scorer at Euro 2024 with three goals
Key Match Events: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia scored the opening goal in the 2nd minute
Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty in the 53rd minute
Pre-Game Insights: Georgia had to take a circuitous route to Germany, first by winning their group in the less glamorous UEFA Nations League tournament then by defeating Greece in a playoff
Post-Match Reflections: Willy Sagnol, the Georgia coach, felt very proud to be their manager
Cristiano Ronaldo was booked in the first half for arguing and cut a frustrated figure when he was substituted after the break
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is Georgia's debut appearance at a major tournament
Georgia's win also means that England will line up against Slovakia, Romania will take on Netherlands and Portugal will face Slovenia in the round of 16
Others: Giorgi Mamardashvili, the Georgia goalkeeper, made late saves to keep Portugal at bay
The game was played at the VELTINS-Arena in Gelsenkirchen, Germany
